Package com.linkedin.venice.spark.datawriter.task

Class DataWriterAccumulators

java.lang.Object
com.linkedin.venice.spark.datawriter.task.DataWriterAccumulators
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class DataWriterAccumulators extends Object implements Serializable
All the AccumulatorV2 objects that are used in the Spark DataWriter jobs.
